content: to last 3 sts slipping markers k3 116 row 16 19 25 36 25 19 124 row 17 k3 p to last 3 sts slipping markers k3 124 row 18 20 27 38 27 20 132 row 19 k3 p to last 3 sts slipping markers k3 132 row 20 21 29 40 29 21 140 for sleeves flat version row 21 divide for sleeves removing markers work as established to first marker remove marker and place these 21 sts on waste yarn co1 st using backward loop co work 29 for left sleeve co1 31 sts turn and work back and forth k next and following 3 row bobble in k break yarn and reattach to body at front after first sleeve worked co 3 for underarm p to marker for sleeve work as for first sleeve break yarn and reattach to right back section co 3 for underarm and work in pattern to end continue with row 22 below in-the-round version row 21 divide for sleeves removing markers work 21 as established put next 29 sts on waste yarn co3 for underarm work 40 sts as established put next 29 sts on waste yarn co3 work as established to end 88 both versions row 22 k to end 88 row 23 k3 p to last 3 sts k3 88 row 24 k to end 88 row 25 k3 p to last 3 sts k3 88 row 26 k to end 88 row 27 k3 p to last 3 sts k3 88 row 28 k to last three sts k2tog yo k1 88 row 29 k3 p to last 3 sts k3 88 row 30 k to end 88 row 31 k3 p to last 3 sts k3 88 row 32 k to end 88 row 33 k3 p to last 3 sts k3 88 flat version row 34 bobble 3 sts at beg of next row k to end 85 in-the-round version row 34 transfer last 3 sts to spare needle transfer first 3 sts to another needle lining up first and last 3 sts side-by-side right sides toward you k the first st on each spare needle together continue with the second and third st adjust needles for knitting in the round two circs magic loop or dpns join and continue working in the round to end of round placket is now beg of round/row both versions from this point on row and round are the same all row are rs row for working in-the-round row 35 and all remaining odd-numbered row p if knitting flat k if knitting in the round row 36 k7 m1 k10 7 times m1 k8 93 even row 38-54 k all sts 93 row 56 k8 m1 k11 7 times m1 k8 101 even row 58-76 k all sts 101 odd row 57-75 k if working in-the- round p if working flat lengthen here if desired but stop about 1/2 short of desired length 18 additional row/rounds recommended for slimmer dolls
